This course has FIVE modules

Introduction to Trading
An opening video sets the scene for this 6-unit module, covering financial markets, the need for fundamental and technical analysis and the importance of psychology for the trader.
Financial Products
Cryptocurrency heads up this 6-unit module which also features units on the Commodities, Forex, Indices, Options & STIRS markets.
Technical Analysis
A video highlights the importance of TA in this 6-unit module, with detailed explanations for the trader on key subjects such as Trends, Bollinger Bands & Fibonacci numbers.
The Psychology of Trading
This 2-unit module provides detailed explanation of the critical value placed on market and trader psychology.
Risk & Money Management
The final 2-unit module focuses the trader on key topics such as leverage, margins, risk strategies, stop losses and risk & money management.

Join Course

Is the world’s first UK Government SKILLSFIRST accredited training provider offering an insight into the world of finance and trading online.

Stellar Education currently have 2 SKILLSFIRST accredited courses in Financial Trading – Level 3 and Level 5. Ideal for someone looking to trade part-time or look for a career in the Financial world. You can learn at your own pace with our experienced traders available for Skype calls if you have any questions.

Both courses are recognised in banks and other Financial Institutions worldwide as the courses have their UK SKILLSFIRST status.

Stellar Education uses a bespoke learning management system (LMS) for the delivery of the qualifications and they are assessed using our unique Online Invigilation System, which cannot be cheated or manipulated and is itself meets the strict guidelines set by awarding organisations regulated by SKILLSFIRST.

Is a British cryptocurrency exchange. The platform was established in 2013 and is constantly expanding its functionality, adding new assets to the listing, and, most importantly, increasing the number of customers. Now with more than 1.8 million users registered on EXMO, the average monthly trading volume exceeds $1.5 billion.

More than six years of operation without data leaks and hacks, flexible commissions, and fast technical support – these are among a list of reasons why clients choose EXMO. The exchange team stood at the origins of the crypto business, and during this time, we understood how to make trading convenient. We pride ourselves on EXMO's simple, intuitive interface, allowing users to begin their journey in crypto-trading easily.

Other courses

Skillsfirst level 3 certificate in financial trading (rqf)

Stellar Educations SKILLSFIRST Regulated 4 – 6 week high-impact Level 3 Certificate in Financial Trading course gives you the skills that you need to start trading on the market, or pursue a career within finance. Whether you want to increase your personal investment portfolio or develop your career within finance, this course will show you how to do it compliantly, effectively and safely.

Whether you want to increase your personal investment portfolio or develop your career within finance, this course will show you how to do it compliantly, effectively and safely.

Learn more
Skillsfirst level 5 diploma in financial trading (rqf)

This 100% online SKILLSFIRST Accredited programme has been designed to develop candidates into independent proprietary trading professionals who wish to pursue a full-time trading career, or pursue a career in finance. Initially, the trainee will be introduced to the global financial futures markets, and acquire a broad overview across a wide level of different futures trading strategies such as outright trading, spreads trading (including inter-exchange, intra-exchange and inter-commodity spreads) and arbitrage used across the FX, Fixed Income, Equities and Commodities markets.

Stellar Educations SKILLSFIRST Regulated 4 – 6 week high-impact Level 3 Certificate in Financial Trading course gives you the skills that you need to start trading on the market, or pursue a career within finance. Whether you want to increase your personal investment portfolio or develop your career within finance, this course will show you how to do it compliantly, effectively and safely.
